Package bio.singa.chemistry.model.elements

Class Element

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.chemistry.model.elements.Element
  • public class Element
extends java.lang.Object
    A chemical element or element is a species of atoms having the same number of protons. Generally no elements need to be created since all common elements are deposited statically in the ElementProvider. Each element is basically final. The isotopes and ions can easily be created with the provided methods.
